summary: A French gang of thieves flies over to Chicago for a one time job. However, things seem to get out of hand soon.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Harvey Keitel|Johnny Hallyday|Renaud|Saïd Taghmaoui|Stéphane Freiss|Shawn Lawrence|Albert Dray|Joanne Kelly|Richard Bohringer|Abe Vigoda|Gino Marrocco|Sal Figliomeni|Diego Chambers|Carlos Diaz|K.C. Collins|Michel Perron|Louis Di Bianco|Jeff Geddis|Joyce Gordon|Dwayne McLean|Rick Sood|Camillo Eugene Natale|Phillip MacKenzie|Lory Wajnberg|Ron Kennell|Scotty Watson|Lyriq Bent|P.J. Ingram|Garnet Harding|Geoffrey Coulter|Reginald Doresa|Billy Khoury|Richard Bauer|Kiera Belley|Liz Gordon|Philip Marshall|Rhona Shekter|J.C. Kenny|Plato Fountidakis|Hakan Coskuner|Grace Armas|Ho Chow|Patrick Ezerzer|Vania Giusto
title: Wanted
